resources.string: The Davidson County Industrial Park is a new facility invisioned by the county commissioner board in 2016. Not only does it bring jobs back into the community, but the complex itself is a sleek and sophisticated monument for Davidson County. With new businesses signing up every day, the total potential for growth is limitless. If you, or anyone you know is interested in applying for office space please contact us using the "Businesses" link on the home page.

Located at 1332 Belmont Drive just outside of Lexington, NC. This rural area is a perfect backdrop to the modern styling and elegance of Davidson Country Industrial Park. With a facility of over 300 Acres, there is more than enough room to accommodate the numerous businesses that have signed up.
Click the button to contact us!
Our complex is already home to many different businesses!
